thread.content:
Rampage o'clock has struck, let's check in on Mr. Rock and the big nasty critters

Follow us on the hashtag #Ramp2018

#BigWhiteMonkey #ScaryLizard #BigOldWolf
Hello I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on this film. #Ramp2018
Hello Hervey here, I'm excited to join the rampage #ramp2018
BEAUTIFUL WB shield to start this, it's so orange #ramp2018
Wow, we're starting in space. Surprising twist! #ramp2018
We're seeing floating laptops and floating corpses, starting with a bang #ramp2018
The space doctor is securing the space samples #ramp2018
I hope this space scientist gets home safe. #ramp2018
This space guinea pig is a clear threat to hull security #ramp2018
Oh no, space scientist down. #ramp2018
RIP spacedoctor #ShesWIthTheSpaceAngelsNow #ramp2018
We're in San Diego! #ramp2018
These gorillas are moving faster and more agilely than any gorillas I've ever seen. #ramp2018
Damn, I was really hoping that these three assistants to The Rock would turn into the three monsters, but now I see that the albino gorilla already exists #ramp2018
George the CG gorilla is a star #ramp2018
I hope the whole film is just The Rock communicating with gorillas. #ramp2018
This woman who is hitting on The Rock looks like she could be his daughter. #ramp2018
I'm actually enjoying that the vibe so far is "elevated CBS sitcom" #ramp2018
"Animals like you, they like you. They don't like you, they eat you." #ClassicMovieLines #ramp2018
Space samples have touched down #ramp2018
Space strikes back! #SpaceStrike #ramp2018
Almost everything is clearly kinda offkilter CG, even things that have no reason to be, this is real Zemeckis-core #ramp2018
Love seeing more of the San Diego Zoo. #ramp2018
It's actually the San Diego Wildlife Preserve #ramp2018
The Rock now has to deal with the classic problem of Gorilla Expansion #ramp2018
This company seems slightly unethical #ramp2018
"There's a reason we were doing these experiments in space" definitely giving "I just want to be awesome in space" vibes. #ClassicMovieLines #TearsOfSteel #ramp2018
Our new protagonist is studying genetics. Could be useful! #ramp2018
I like that we get a full on-screen shot of her ID card in the first 10 seconds she's on screen, very helpful (her name is Kathleen, if I read it right) #ramp2018
This movie moves like Jumper. Now we're in Wyoming! #WyomingTrip #ramp2018
We're covering so many different locations, this isn't exactly "coherent" or "good" storytelling, but if feels very Earful #ramp2018
The Rock knows that his gorilla friend is more useful massive and alive than dead and not massive. #ramp2018
"He's growing, isn't he?" #ClassicMovieLines #ramp2018
They're going to run out of cages large enough pretty soon. #ramp2018
Very nice website she's got on her phone that shows all the cool animal traits. #ramp2018
It seems like a great business plan to test the "make animals power and unpredictable" serum on a space station #ramp2018
"It's not gonna hold" #ClassicMovieLines #ramp2018
I feel like George getting tranquilized is a very reasonable step and not worth this level of drama. #ramp2018
George has been tranquilized, glad that we've solved our conflicts #ramp2018
These guys getting decimated by this wolf is giving StarCraft opening cinematic vibes. #ramp2018
This reminds me more of a Cabela's hunting game, great POV shots of elk jumping at you #ramp2018
This wolf is really outclassing George so far, much more impressive monster #ramp2018
Why is The Rock in handcuffs? #ramp2018
His primatology was downright criminal #ramp2018
The government seems to have everything under control here. What a relief. #ramp2018

I thought I could trust Kate, until I learned she stole those disk drives

Let's trust the govt guy to simply destroy George #ramp2018
Glad to see that modifying radio antennae at the top of the Willis Tower isn't caught up in red tape, this is such a smoothly running operation #ramp2018
This dialogue is parody-level dumb action movie dialogue. #ramp2018

I think it's actually very smart

UPDATE: Ralph is visiting Mount Rushmore #ramp2018
UPDATE: the lizard we haven't seen in 45 minutes is back, and headed for Chicago #ramp2018
George has apparently inherited the "don't be harmed by bullets" trait from the most bulletproof animal #ramp2018
I recommend they stop shooting George. #ramp2018
George can turn this plane around. #ramp2018
The Rock going the extra mile to save the government dude. #TrueHeroism #ramp2018
No way George can survive that one #ramp2018
Can't kill George at this point. #ramp2018
"Thank you for getting this ol' cowboy off that plane" #ClassicMovieLines #ramp2018
Evil Company seems to have two arcade machines in their office #ramp2018
Malin Akerman is attempting to pin the monsterification on Kate, and folks, #ThatsNotRight #ramp2018
I like how even a shot like "human being The Rock, standing in front of some corn fields" looks like 98% CG #ramp2018
"Every time I'd make a breakthrough that could help my brother they were secretly using it to make weaponized DNA." #FirstWorldProblems #ramp2018
UPDATE: George and Ralph now appear to be making a coordinated long-distance journey #ramp2018
"This is no longer a wolf and a gorilla" - The Rock, who must know about the lizard as well #ramp2018
If they believe CEO Claire has the antidote, what exactly are they adding to the equation? I say trust Claire #TrustClaire #ramp2018
George and Ralph have been blown up; RIP George and Ralph #theygone #ramp2018
Oh wow, they survived #ramp2018
Finally they're evacuating Chicago! #ramp2018
I worry that they're never going to get everyone out of the city in time #ramp2018
We're finally delivering on the promise of a true rampage #ramp2018
Makes sense the military doesn't have a submarine in the Chicago river. #ramp2018
LIZARD IS HERE! #ramp2018
I suspect that if all forces are directed at Lizzy the Lizard, she will very quickly be exterminated #ramp2018
Calling it now: it's only a matter of time before they decide to go nuclear. #ramp2018
I agree with The Rock: I think the antidote would be very helpful right now #ramp2018
The bomb that will wipe out half of Chicago: now leaving from MO #ramp2018
Looking forward to seeing these B-2s in action! #ramp2018
Oh no, Kate's workstation has been decommissioned by the FBI. #ramp2018
2018 was a big year for The Rock films with business tycoons escaping via helicopter while there is somebody infiltrating their building. #SkyscraperRampage #ramp2018
The cure for monsterism has been located #ramp2018
UPDATES: Rock shot, monsters now climbing Willis Tower #ramp2018
Yesssss, GEORGE IS BACK! #ramp2018
I hope the monsters destroy the radio signal that's annoying them, and are able to live happily ever after #ramp2018
The shot of the woman being eaten by the gorilla looked like the cheapest CG imaginable. #ramp2018
Finally delivering on the last of the checkboxes for a Rampage adaptation: human eaten #ramp2018

In the last five minutes we've gotten Malin Akerman saying "That happened", and now the cowboy guy saying "Oh man, that was a lot", after two horrific violent acts

2018 really peak soy-writing #ramp2018
How is this radio antenna so hard to destroy? They're monsters!! #ramp2018
Among other bullshit happening, I believe The Loop has been partially destroyed #ramp2018
Helicopter plan worked out surprisingly well. #ramp2018
The Rock is doing quite well for a guy who's been shot and has been in a helicopter crash #ramp2018
"I can't believe we survived that" #ClassicMovieLines #ramp2018
George better not turn on his monster brethren #ramp2018
Now George is on our side! #ramp2018
I don't really care about any of the people or animals in this film. #ramp2018
I like Lizzy #TeamLizzy #ramp2018
"Of course the wolf flies" #ClassicMovieLines #PeakSoy #ramp2018
George to the rescue! #ramp2018
Looking good for Team Lizzy right now 😎 #LizItUp #BigLizard #ramp2018
I say drop the MOAB. The whole serum plan isn't really working and it seems like the best option at this point. #ramp2018
Nice that the heavily damaged helicopter started up with all systems green! #ramp2018
This monster has destroyed so many helicopters already. What is one more really going to do? The Rock should know this. #ramp2018
Lizzy ain't never going down! #TeamLizzy #ImmortalLiz #ramp2018
MOAB incoming! #ramp2018
Oh nevermind they called it off. Boooooo. #ramp2018
Really sad Lizzy wasn't able to enjoy a final snack of The Rock #RipLizzy #ramp2018

If George survives, he could really be a part of Chicago's big comeback

Could be a bigger tourist attraction than The Bean #ramp2018
The whole crew is here! But what about The Rock's hapless assistants from San Diego? Will we ever see them again? #ramp2018
I'm honestly shocked that they weren't a bigger part of the movie, they honestly vibed with the film's general MO so well #ramp2018
I'm so sick of George's bullshit #ramp2018
I'd be OK if this film ended about five minutes ago. #ramp2018

This isn't film 

It's impossible to overstate how bad this looks

Characters are just repeating lines #ramp2018
Wow, four people credited for the screenplay. It takes a village! #ramp2018

Overall, I expected this movie to be stupid, and targeted strictly at 11-year-old boys, but it significantly undershot the level of sophistication I expected

I did not like it at all, but I do have to admit that it's antic enough to be an Earful movie #ramp2018
There's definitely a lot to potentially dissect. Tracking the evolution of the monsters could be fun. I don't know that it's a very enjoyable world to be immersed in for 40 hours, though. #ramp2018

God, it would have been so much better if his three assistants turned into the monsters

Should have hired me as the script doctor #ramp2018
